original_title: Private bus strike on two routes
original_body_lines: Private bus operators on the Kottawa - Borella (174) and Kottawa – Mount Lavinia (225) routes have launched a strike.
The strike action has been commenced in protest over the decision to deploy 10 luxury buses covering the two said routes.
Meanwhile, the private bus operators allege that the luxury buses in question have been deployed without informing the relevant private bus associations.
